channel.title: .:Get a server hosted on a dedicated server!:
channel.description:
Hello & welcome to my Get your server hosted on a dedicated server thread! Here i am holding a contest to see what server will run 24/7 on Tilts server! So signup now! It will be no lag and online 24/7 - Must be windows based.
Server Host ~ Tilt - Kind enough to let us use her dedicated server.
Requirements - 1 - Must be coded by you or your team members. Leeched servers will be declined. 2 - You must update the server frequent. 3 - The server must not be varrock based. 4 - The server must have atleast 5+ Shops. 5 - The server must have Silabsoft items or a client coded by you with nice items and a 377+ cache. 6 - It must be a unique server. 7 - You must post screenshots of the server. 8 - Must have a working auto-restarter.
The IP your server will be hosted on is - 168.215.66.60 OR YourServerName.no-ip.org [Both are hosted on a 24/7 dedicated server]
So post some screenshots, servername, and maybe a demo ip for me and my mate to join.
Thanks Ghost.

item.title: .:Get a server hosted on a dedicated server!:
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Yea, and i wouldnt want somone who refers to Private Server programming as “coding” be able to have control over my server[quote=“gh0styscape, post:5, topic:170001”]First,
Im not going to steal anyones source i can code for myself.

Second,
Fuck this retarded community, your all a bunch of stupid 12 year olds. Im trying to HELP out. Not fucking cause arguments. Be honest why the hell would i take your source? I dont need it i can just make one or download one.

BYE,
I’ll host my own.[/quote]
Lol, your a idiot. Not everyone here is 12. Your not trying to help out. Your trying to steal other peoples work.

item.title: .:Get a server hosted on a dedicated server!:
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

That’s ok mate. They make servers now that hold 3000+ for only around 30$. I would rather buy my own server, then have you steal my source.

Sorry =-)

Note to all, this person will steal your source!

Just look what he requires…It’s all to his benefit. Trust me.

By the way, my server is very successful, so don’t diss mopar or it’s users, or I will hunt you down and kill you with my Bandos Godsword

Read full topic

item.title: .:Get a server hosted on a dedicated server!:
item.dc:creator: @gh0styscape gh0styscape
item.description:
@gh0styscape wrote:

To be honest i wouldnt want to steal a private server. Im capable of coding them. The person that wins get full administrator status on the server were about 50+ were online all the time. She hosted Project-Czar on it and there was 85+ Online with no lag.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2008, 07:53:16 PM[/size][hr]So next time please get your story straight. Im not here to fight, im here to set up a server that will be successful for once.

Read full topic

Hello & welcome to my Get your server hosted on a dedicated server thread!
Here i am holding a contest to see what server will run 24/7 on Tilts server! So signup now! It will be no lag and online 24/7 - Must be windows based.
